## Instructions for scripts in this folder:

1. 04-chap-fisherSpatial_analysis:
    - Analyzes the BBS data using regimeDetectionMeasures and distanceTRavelled
    - Run this script only if you need to update the results (saved as R objects in folder rObjs). This will take some time, depending on the # of t-sects you are running...
    
1. 04-chap-fisherSpatial_visualize...
    - Run this to produce some plots that will be saved to file, and will be called in the dissertation (see folder figures)
